body: i'm thankful that miso and i got to facetime with d this morning and i'm thankful she will be home in two days. i'm thankful for the mediocre sandwich i had delivered last night, even though it was mediocre. i'm thankful for [kelly conaboy](https://www.thecut.com/2018/09/why-everyone-is-talking-about-megan-markle-closing-her-door.html?utm_medium=s1&utm_campaign=nym&utm_source=tw).
